questionText: In what year did Walt Disney first sketch Mickey Mouse?
The original concept art for Ursula in 'The Little Mermaid' was based on the drag queen Divine.
Which Disney film was the first to use the Deep Canvas animation technique?
Disney's 'Sleeping Beauty' was a commercial failure upon its initial release.
Which Disney theme park was the first to feature the 'Splash Mountain' attraction?
The Marvel villain Apocalypse's real name is En Sabah Nur.
In the comics, which superhero was responsible for the creation of the supervillain Venom?
In the original Marvel Comics, Captain America's shield was made of a vibranium-adamantium alloy.
Which character was the first non-Thor individual deemed worthy to lift Mjolnir in Marvel Comics?
Wolverine's adamantium skeleton was grafted onto his body as part of the Weapon X program.
What substance powers lightsabers in Star Wars?
Jedi Master Sifo-Dyas ordered the creation of the clone army before the events of 'The Phantom Menace'.
What is the name of the planet where Count Dooku was killed by Anakin Skywalker?
The Mandalorian language is called Mando'a.
Which of these Star Wars characters was NOT killed by Darth Vader?
The character Eve in 'WALL-E' was designed with input from Apple's Jonathan Ive.
What was the working title for 'Finding Nemo' during production?
Pixar's 'Inside Out' features six different emotions as main characters.
Which of these Pixar films was directed by Brad Bird?
In 'Ratatouille', Gusteau's restaurant had 5 stars before losing one due to a negative review from Anton Ego.
In 'The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past', what is the name of the parallel world to Hyrule?
In the original 'The Legend of Zelda', the second quest is accessible by entering the name 'ZELDA' as your save file.
What is the name of the Ocarina tune that teleports Link to the Temple of Time in 'Ocarina of Time'?
The Happy Mask Salesman in 'Majora's Mask' is the same character as the one in 'Ocarina of Time'.
Which game in the Zelda series first introduced the Hookshot item?
